forecast_and_report module¶

Created on Oct 20, 2016.

forecast_and_report.data_frame_res(columns, column_names, ts)[source]¶
forecast_and_report.forecasting_errors(data, idx_original)[source]¶
forecast_and_report.main(file_name=None, line_indices='all', header=True, format_='date')[source]¶

Runs forecasting models and reports results in latex file

Parameters:
  • file_name (str) – file name (.csv) with data in IoT format
  • line_indices – indices of lines to read from file. Lines are enumerated from 1. If “all”, read the whole file
  • header (bool) – Specifies if the file contains a header row
Returns:

latex report
Return type:

str
forecast_and_report.mean_squared_error(f, y)[source]¶
forecast_and_report.train_model_CV(data, model, n_fold=5, windows=(5, 10, 25, 50, 75, 100, 150), params={}, f_horizon=1, plot=False)[source]¶
